name: Crappy Astro Smashers
description:
Crappy Astro Smashers is like Astroids but with Crappy astroids.

=====CONTROLS=====

=====MOVE=====

w = move forward 

a = turn left 

d = turn right

or use the arrow keys.

=====SHOOT=====

Spacebar 

Hold the spacebar for 3 sec for better Aiming.

=====DOWNLOAD AND SETUP=====

Download, unzip the Game and Run astroids.exe

=====Thanks for Playing=====
